nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND A SIGNIFICANT FLOOD THREAT LINGERING ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE NORTHEAST...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL AND A SIGNIFICANT FLOOD THREAT LINGERING ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE NORTHEAST...
 As of 5:00 PM EDT Fri Aug 9
 the center of Debby was located near 44.0, -74.9
 with movement NE at 38 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
